actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to extend authority for operation of the Department of Veterans Affairs Regional Office in Manila, the Republic of the Philippines.
short_title: Keeping Our Commitment to Overseas Veterans Act

summary.text:
Keeping Our Commitment to Overseas Veterans Act

This bill extends authority through September 30, 2018, for operation of the Department of Veterans Affairs Regional Office in Manila, the Republic of the Philippines.
